review.title: “Great learning experience and introduction to electronics manufacturing standards”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible schedule,Friendly co-workers,A lot of inspiration for future projects,Company is growing at a fast rate,Defenders of Open Source and Open Hardware.
review.cons: Cons – With so many ideas, shipping, and projects going on it is very easy to make a mess; cleanliness needs to improve.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get some sleep.

review.title: “Productive work atmosphere.”
review.pros: Pros – Small size, so everybody grows a relationship with each other.
review.cons: Cons – The internet connection can get congested at times.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
